episodes.title: Synanon Hollywood Trailer from Synanon Movie with Outtakes and B Roll Footage | Rebranding Evol
episodes.description:
Synanon Hollywood Trailer from Synanon Movie with Outtakes and B Roll Footage | Rebranding Evol

TRIGGER WARNING
______________________________________________________________________

This is some footage that I have come across in my research of Synanon and the Church of Synanon Cult. Please do not proceed to watching this footage if you suffer tremendously from PTSD or other diagnosis that were caused by torture in the troubled teen industry, by the g*v, or by a cult or trafficking operation. Please know that every single survivor is important, you matter.

If you need someone to talk to or help please email us at:

rebrandingevol@gmail.com

______________________________________________________________________

This footage is that of the Hollywood trailer for the film titled "Synanon". I have always wondered why so many famous people went to CEDU and RMA and it really does seem to make sense that Synanon was in Santa Monica and famous people would hang out there.

I guess, for me, this video is testament that the "fiends" were actually hanging around the "squares" in Los Angeles. 

This footage also shows a Hollywood rendition of "The Game" which featured attack therapy. Even in the movie it looks mild compared to what it actually was like in real life. People referred to it as "Fight Club but with words". 

I am so glad to be healing from my journey, I hope that this helps solve some of the mystery for you involving CEDU and the Synanon cult. I will continue to keep unlocking closed doors so that we can all see what is behind the veil that has been covered up so deeply.

-MK ORPHAN

episodes.title: What it's Like to Graduate from a Cult / Rocky Mountain Academy Graduation Ceremony / CEDU / TTI
episodes.description:
Rocky Mountain Academy Graduation | CEDU | North Idaho

TRIGGER WARNING!

This video contains subject matter that can be disturbing to some viewers. Some of the people that are in this video, sadly, have passed away. I dedicate all of my work to those friends. May you rest easy.

*******************************************************************************************************

When I was 15 I was kidnapped by my own father and my sister. I had been emancipated in the state of Washington but they tricked me and once I figured out what they were up to, and I tried to get out of the car, they held me in the car for about 5 miles while I was pleading and fighting and screaming… trying to get away.

I ended up at a “boarding school” for bad teenagers, although it was not a school it was a cult. 

This is a clip, taken out of a promotional video, that is of graduation. The day that I escaped. 

I had no idea that this video even existed, finding it was sort of a shock to the system. It’s like it was yesterday, but at the same time so far away.

I cannot believe that they put us through a week of sleep deprivation, primal scream therapy, abuse, starvation, temperature fluctuations and more, just to get us into a state of transcendental meditation or shall I say hypnosis. 

They believed in the pendulum swing, to the degree that you feel sadness, to that same degree you will feel joy.

Rest in peace to all of the homies in this video that are no longer with us. You are loved and missed. 

To contact us write to:

rebrandingevol@gmail.com

Thank you for being respectful.

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

episodes.title: SYNANON Cult Lingo and Code Phrases PART 1 | Rebranding Evol | Breaking it Down | CEDU | Code Speak
episodes.description:
#SYNANON #Cult Lingo and #code  Phrases PART 1 | Rebranding Evol | Breaking it Down | CEDU | Code #Speak 


Thank you for supporting us and watching our videos. 

Here is the info for the video below:

VIDEO 4

#REBRANDINGEVOL | THE STORY OF THE #CHURCH OF SYNANON CULT
AND THE CEDU #LEGACY

Please be aware that there is a trigger warning for most of my videos. This subject matter contains, but is not limited to, child abuse, #true #crime, sexual assault, #violence, #missing people and even #murder. The #brainwashing techniques discussed are for mature audiences only, proceed with caution.

THICKENED #LIGHT

I never have to work very hard to use the information that I live in a motion-normal universe, that what is here today will inevitably change tomorrow. The only thing in this universe which resists movement is the #human #ego, which is probably the reason we are always so uncomfortable. Synanon is simply my attempt to get a few other heads in tune with the very simple scientific truth that things don't stand still.

- CED (Chuck E. Dederick 0.1968)

OUT OF AGREEMENT

Out of Agreement means that something is against the rules, not allowed. If you wrote a list of the "Out of Agreement" things you did, this is a "Dirt List" and you are "Dirty".

CUTTING UP MUSIC

Cutting Up Music referred to playing, singing, humming or talking about music that was not in agreement or was against the rules. This would make an individual "dirty" as well.

DIRT / DIRTY

When you have "Dirt" it means you have broken the rules and are, AKA, Out of Agreement. This means that you need to "clean up" your "dirt" so vou can be "in agreement" again and be "clean".

RAPS / THE GAME

Raps / The Synanon Game - This was three times a week at CEDU and it was attack therapy. The only rules were no violence or getting out of your chair. People had to sit on chairs in a circle, and if you had something confrontational to tell someone you had to get up and walk across the room to speak to them... usually they started screaming at you, and many times it was more than one person. Up to 5 or 6.

PROPHEET WORKSHOPS

Prophet Workshops were basically really long raps but with fun things added like sleep and light deprivation (so you didn't know if it was day or night), temperature fluctuations, physical violence and more. The longest one was 7 nights of absolute, delusional sleep deprivation. You had to
sign an NDA if you participated. NO, Paris Hilton did not do The Summit Propheet.


Thank you for watching and supporting our channel. Please support by hitting the like and subscribe button, and then by hitting the white alert on the bell so you can be notified of our next video.

If you would like to reach out, or you would like to send us your story please email rebrandingevol@gmail.com.

ALL ORIGINAL MUSIC ALL RIGHTS RESERVED

episodes.title: Rebranding Evol | EP2 | Introduction to Cult Lingo for Easy Indoctrination into the Cult Society
episodes.description:
Rebranding Evol | EP2 | Introduction to Cult Lingo for Easy Indoctrination into the Cult Society

TRIGGER WARNING: Violent cults and drugs in this content. 

When you walk into a place like #CEDU it is concerning to say the least. After I had been kidnapped, illegally, and taken to a "school" deep in the woods of North Idaho, I instantly knew I was in a #cult.

There was a lot of #code being spoken and then taught, the students would teach each other in order to confuse the Psyche and make it easier to infiltrate and #reprogram. 

The first one I heard was "cutting up music" and this referred to talking about musicians and bands that were "out of agreement'. "Out of agreement" referred to breaking the rules or things that were not allowed, like certain Beatles songs but not others. By the time you were there for at least two years you knew all of the ones you weren't "allowed" to listen to. 

Please hit like and subscribe to our channel so we can continue to get more information to you about these, sometimes, deadly cults that still exist in America. 

Our next episode will be breaking down more of these terms. 

Thanks for watching!

episodes.title: Rebranding Evol | The Story of the Church of Synanon and the CEDU Legacy
episodes.description:
Rebranding Evol | The Story of the Church of Synanon and the CEDU Leagacy

Have you ever wondered about the #Synanon #cult? What went on there, or what the survivors have to say about it? Well, in the true crime world, this subject is gaining popularity. Synanon went on to rebrand and open more schools under the name CEDU, which stands for Charles E Dederich University. These schools were all teenagers. I am doing a lot of research for a book I'm writing about it so I'm sharing as I go along.  

This is a reel about "Who is Synanon" and it is a  good starting point. We are going to explore so much of the inner and outer workings of these cults, what their ties are to #FreeMasonry as well as people like #jimjones.

I was in one of these for 3 years. I'm ready to talk. 

TRIGGER WARNING:
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Some of the things in these videos can be very triggering. Especially for members who are no longer there and trying to rehabilitated from the trauma. Proceed with caution.
